revised_title: Astronomical Observations of the Moon's Eclipse and Vernal Equinox
tldr: The author, M. Francis de Zach, shares his observations of the lunar eclipse and vernal equinox, using an achromatic telescope to study the eclipse's details. He also discusses the adjustments made to a pendulum clock to account for the difference in apparent and solar time. The observations were conducted in collaboration with Father LE FEVRE at the grand College Observatory.
